EmailTemplate.name: 2012_Texas-Medicaid-Submitters_June.EmailBlast
EmailTemplate.subject: ATTENTION Texas Medicaid Submitters - July 1, 2012 Deadline for EDI 5010 Compliancy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ATTENTION Texas Medicaid Submitters
June 7, 2012 Texas Medicaid submitters must be EDI 5010 compliant by July 1, 2012. To become compliant, you must request a 5010 submitter ID from TMHP AND must complete the required setup in Sweet-Billing to begin creating 5010 compliant claim files.
To request a 5010 submitter ID, e-mail the following information to edi5010support@tmhp.com <mailto:edi5010support@tmhp.com> and/or Stephanie.kinnison@tmhp.com <mailto:Stephanie.kinnison@tmhp.com>:
1. Company Name: 2. Physical address: 3. Phone number: 4. Email contact: 5. Software vendor: Tritech 6. 4010 ID (if you currently have one): 7. TPI #: 8. Let TMHP know whether or not you plan to receive an 835 X12 file, or if you will receive the .pdf version of the R&S. - If so, we will need a form to link the 5010 submitter ID and TPIs used for billing. 9. Let TMHP know which transactions you will be submitting to TMHP. Transaction type must be chosen or process will be delayed. - Long term care or acute - Acute - Transaction type (i.e. 270; 837I; 837P etcâ€¦) 837P
To complete the required setup in Sweet-Billing (recently rebranded as Respond Billing) to begin creating 5010 compliant claim files, please review the information in the HIPAA 5010 Resource Center http://www.tritechems.com/My-Account/Download-Center/Support_HIPAA5010ResourceCenter.asp <http://www.tritechems.com/My-Account/Download-Center/Support_HIPAA5010ResourceCenter.asp> - specifically the HIPAA 5010 Migration to Production Billing document in the Resource section of this page.
Please act now to prevent any interruption to your revenue from Texas Medicaid.
Dan Voss Product Manager TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com
